S04bsu032_u:3: Vaidya n = pagination of P.L. Vaidya's edition (added by Klaus Wille)
S04bsu032_u:4: NOTE: Where a page break occurs within a word,
S04bsu032_u:6: shifted to the end of the word in order not to interfere with word search.
S04bsu032_u:14_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā
S04bsu032_u:16_0: mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena
S04bsu032_u:16_1: ca revatena ca śuddhipanthakena ca nandena ca ānandena ca rāhulena ca gavāṃpatinā
S04bsu032_u:16_2: ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena ca aniruddhena ca /
S04bsu032_u:28: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayati sma - asti śāriputra paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhākṣetrāṇāmatikramya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu032_u:29: tatra amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S04bsu032_u:30: dharmaṃ ca deśayati tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate?
S04bsu032_u:31: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkham /
S04bsu032_u:33: tena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate // Sukhs_2 //
S04bsu032_u:34: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhirvedikābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ kiṅkiṇījālaiśca samalaṃkṛtā samantato 'nupatikṣiptā citrā darśanīyā caturṇāṃ ratnānām /
S04bsu032_u:36: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_3 //
S04bsu032_u:37_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ - tadyathā
S04bsu032_u:37_1: suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasya aśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya
S04bsu032_u:39: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samantāccaturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi darśanīyāni caturṇāṃ ratnānām - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya /
S04bsu032_u:40_0: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samantādratnavṛkṣā jātāścitrā darśanīyāḥ saptānāṃ ratnānām
S04bsu032_u:40_1: - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasyāśmagarbhasya
S04bsu032_u:41: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu santi padmāni jātāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni nīlanidarśanāni /
S04bsu032_u:44: Sukhs, Vaidya 255#) avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanirbhāsāni avadātanidarśanāni /
S04bsu032_u:46: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_4 //
S04bsu032_u:47: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni tūryāṇi /
S04bsu032_u:49: tatra ca buddhakṣetre triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇām /
S04bsu032_u:50: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste ekena purobhaktena koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vandanti anyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā /
S04bsu032_u:51: ekaikaṃ ca tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhirabhyavakīrya punarapi tāmeva lokadhātumāgacchanti divāvihārāya /
S04bsu032_u:52: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_5 //
S04bsu032_u:53: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre santi haṃsāḥ krauñcā mayūrāśca /
S04bsu032_u:54: te triṣkṛtvo rātro triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvanti sma,
S04bsu032_u:57: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate,
S04bsu032_u:63: nāmāpi śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti,
S04bsu032_u:65: te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghāstenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayanti /
S04bsu032_u:66: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_6 //
S04bsu032_u:67_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ
S04bsu032_u:67_1: vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati - tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṅgikasya
S04bsu032_u:67_2: divyasya tūryasya cāryaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
S04bsu032_u:68: evameva śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04bsu032_u:69: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati,
S04bsu032_u:72: evarūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_7 //
S04bsu032_u:73: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyurnāmocyate?
S04bsu032_u:74: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāmaparimitamāyuḥpramāṇam /
S04bsu032_u:76: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya // Sukhs_8 //
S04bsu032_u:77: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho nāmocyate?
S04bsu032_u:78: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhā apratihatā sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu /
S04bsu032_u:80: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ pramāṇamākhyātuḥ śuddhānāmarhatām /
S04bsu032_u:81: evaḥrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaḥkṛtaḥ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_9 //
S04bsu032_u:82_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra ye amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapannāḥ śuddhā
S04bsu032_u:82_1: bodhisattvā avinivartanīyā ekajātipratibaddhāsteṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇa#
S04bsu032_u:85: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetre sattvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu032_u:87: yatra hi nāma tathārūpaiḥ satpuruṣaiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu032_u:88: nāvaramātrakeṇa śāriputra kuśalamūlena amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyante /
S04bsu032_u:89: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati,
S04bsu032_u:91: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati,
S04bsu032_u:92: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu032_u:93: tasya kālaṃ kurvataḥ so 'mitāyustathāgataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtaḥ purataḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu032_u:95: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
S04bsu032_u:96: tasmāttarhi śāriputra idamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāna eva vadāmi - satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kartavyam // Sukhs_10 //
S04bsu032_u:97: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi,
S04bsu032_u:98: evameva śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāmerurnāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato mañjudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:99: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:100: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_11 //
S04bsu032_u:101: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi candrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho nāma tathāgato mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma tathāgato 'nantavīryo nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:102: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:103: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_12 //
S04bsu032_u:104_0: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'mitaskandho nāma tathāgato 'mitadhvajo
S04bsu032_u:104_1: nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato mahāratnaketurnāma tathāgataḥ śuddharaśmiprabho nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:105: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:106: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_13 //
S04bsu032_u:107_0: evamuttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu032_u:107_1: dundubhisvaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgataḥ ādityasaṃbhavo
S04bsu032_u:107_2: nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:108: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra uttarāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:109: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_14 //
S04bsu032_u:111_0: Sukhs, Vaidya 257#) evamadhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu032_u:111_1: yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nāma tathāgato dharmadharo nāma tathāgato dharmadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:112: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra adhastāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:113: pratīyatha yūiyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_15 //
S04bsu032_u:114_0: evamupariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo nāma tathāgata indraketudhvajarājo
S04bsu032_u:114_1: nāma tathāgato gandhottamo nāma tathāgato gandhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskandho
S04bsu032_u:114_2: nāma tathāgato ratnakusumasaṃpuṣpitagātro nāma tathāgataḥ sālendrarājo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu032_u:114_3: ratnotpalaśrīrnāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśī nāma tathāgataḥ sumerukalpo nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:115: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:116: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_16 //
S04bsu032_u:117: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho nāmocyate?
S04bsu032_u:118: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti,
S04bsu032_u:119: teṣāṃ va buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu032_u:122: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām /
S04bsu032_u:123: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu032_u:128: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhirutpādayitavyaḥ // Sukhs_17 //
S04bsu032_u:129: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayāmi,
S04bsu032_u:130: evameva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā bhagavanta evamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayanti /
S04bsu032_u:132: sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kleśakaṣāye // Sukhs_18 //
S04bsu032_u:133_0: tanmamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yanmayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S04bsu032_u:133_1: sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye
S04bsu032_u:135: āyuṣmān śāriputraste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan // Sukhs_20 //
